Installation
============

Requirements
-----------

* Python 3.7 or higher
* NumPy 1.19.0 or higher

Basic Installation
----------------

Install using pip:

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install .

Development Installation
----------------------

For development, clone the repository and install in editable mode:

.. code-block:: bash

    git clone https://github.com/stackblitz/data-processing
    cd data-processing
    pip install -e .
